name: Create Facebook posts with photos from a custom webhook
description: Effortlessly enhance your social media presence by automating your Facebook page posts with photos using a custom webhook. This template allows you to trigger a new post on your Facebook page every time a specific event occurs, ensuring your audience stays engaged with fresh content. Simply set up your custom webhook to send the necessary data, and Make will handle the rest, creating visually appealing posts that capture attention and drive interaction.
